paper_abstract: Using fixed point methods, we prove the generalized Hyers-Ulam stability of homomorphisms in Banach algebras and of derivations on Banach algebras for the additive functional equation (m)Sigma(i=1) f(mx(i) + (m)Sigma(j=1, j not equal i) x(j)) + f((m)Sigma(i=1) x(i)) = 2f((m)Sigma(i=1) mx(i)) for all m is an element of N with m >= 2.
paper_title: FIXED POINTS AND STABILITY OF ADDITIVE FUNCTIONAL EQUATIONS ON THE BANACH ALGEBRAS
